column5: 1920's home turned duplex, in close proximity to Downtown, parks, museums, Zoo, military bases, Pearl, airport and more. A short walk to several restaurants, breakfast tacos too. This is an older house in a historic neighborhood with over 1,000 square feet. I am out of town a lot but my best friends live below and is the caretaker. There are 3 window units, two TVs with cable and TiVo; in living room and bedroom. Bonus: One covered parking space (more street parking near by).
column8: Spacious! Upstairs duplex 5 minutes from downtown!
